content.question: ​In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, the graph of the rational function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> has a vertical asymptote at <math alttext="x equals 4"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>. Which of the following expressions could define <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses cubed open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over denominator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses 4 minus x close parentheses cubed end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses cubed open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over denominator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses 4 minus x close parentheses squared end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses cubed open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses cubed over denominator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses 4 minus x close parentheses squared end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over denominator open parentheses 4 x plus 4 close parentheses squared open parentheses 4 plus x close parentheses cubed end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses cubed open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses squared over denominator open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses squared open parentheses 4 minus x close parentheses cubed end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
